For a brief period, i lived in staten island (brooklyn was getting too expensive).  I lived in the st george area and we had <https://www.nytimes.com/2017/03/02/nyregion/at-this-staten-island-restaurant-a-kitchen-run-by-grandmas.html|this place>.
This was where i ate brains for the first time ever :grinning_face_with_one_large_and_one_small_eye:
